https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iOV1tImKRswgH9IlIC2BRvgpHC4.jpg Beside Bowie: The Mick Ronson Story is a documentary about the life and work of Michael "Mick" Ronson, the guitarist, songwriter, producer and arranger who, in the early part of his career, performed with David Bowie as one of the 'Spiders from Mars'. Beside Bowie: The Mick Ronson Story
